oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Hooks Takes Oath As Criminal Court Judge"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; Evans, Joseph; Hooks, Benjamin L.; law; Shelby County Criminal Court; 1960s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Benjamin L. Hooks and Joseph W. Evans were sworn in as judges of Division IV and V Criminal Courts, respectively.
